origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'RealEstateAPI.analyze_debt_ratio', 'description': 'This function analyzes the debt ratio of a real estate developer and compares it with the industry average.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'developerName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the real estate developer.'}, {'name': 'industryAverage', 'type': 'BOOLEAN', 'description': 'Whether to compare the debt ratio with the industry average.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'debtRatioAnalysis', 'description': 'The analysis of the developer's debt ratio compared to the industry average.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 RealEstateAPI.analyze_debt_ratio, 它的参数输入如下: 'developerName'是'Skyline Builders', 'industryAverage'是'true'.
